record.dc:title: 297BN74(A) Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 84BN16, indeterminate infant in good condition, fully flexed on back with head oriented to SW. Stratum I. Square 20R11. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: Peculiar that these little brats get the shell. Good infant, peculiar gastropod beads around pelvis.
